:nodoc:

[Source]

    # File app/helpers/pages_helper.rb, line 55
55:   def alchemy_form_reset_button(name, options={})
56:     button_to_function(
57:       name,
58:       remote_function(
59:         :url => {
60:           :controller => "contact_form",
61:           :action => "clear_session"
62:         },
63:         :before => %(
64:           this.form.reset();
65:           this.form.descendants().each(
66:             function(d){
67:               if ((d.type!='button') && (d.type!='submit') && (d.type!='hidden') && !d.disabled) {
68:                 d.value = '';
69:                 if (d.type == 'checkbox') {
70:                   d.checked = false;
71:                 }
72:               }
73:             }
74:           )
75:         )
76:       ),
77:       options
78:     )
79:   end
